long_description: The REI Traverse trekking poles offer stability and steady traction on the trail as well as ice and rock surfaces. Strong, 3-section 7075-T6 aluminum alloy shafts extend to 55 in. and compact to 27 in. to fit on your pack. DuoLock(TM) internal twisting locking mechanisms apply a wide area of pressure against pole walls to lock in length adjustment. With the Stop Lock system, pole sections lock into a single unit for security and stability and won't come apart. Soft EVA foam hand grips have an ergonomic, contoured shape and are easy to hold; adjustable padded neoprene wrist straps add support. Poles are fitted with extra-durable tungsten carbide tips; trekking baskets promote stability on soft terrain and easily twist on and off.
short_description: The REI Traverse trekking poles offer stability and steady traction on the trail as well as ice and rock surfaces.
